scripts.build: mkdir -p .local .local/css .local/img .local/js && cp html/index.html .local/ && cp css/style.css node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css .local/css/ && cp node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather-sprite.svg .local/img/ && cp .secrets.js .local/js/api-keys.js && webpack js/main.js --mode development -o .local/js/bundle.js
scripts.upload: mkdir -p .upload .upload/css .upload/img .upload/js && cp html/index.html .upload && cp css/style.css node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css .upload/css/ && cp node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather-sprite.svg .upload/img && cp .secrets-production.js .upload/js/api-keys.js && webpack js/main.js --mode production -o ./.upload/js/bundle.js && (cd .upload && rsync -v -r . floppnet@echeclus.uberspace.de:/var/www/virtual/floppnet/2oc.de/)
